name: Highway Legends: Complete DLC Bundle
summary: Elevate your Highway Legends experience with the Complete DLC Bundle, featuring three essential expansions: Highway Legends: Road to Riches, which provides 300,000 coins to boost your vehicle upgrades and enhance your racing strategy; Highway Legends: Triple Threat on Street, which unlocks three powerful new cars designed for maximum performance and speed in urban races; and Highway Legends: Desert Mirage Unveiled, which grants access to a stunning new desert map with unique tracks and challenges to conquer. Unlock the full potential of your racing journey with the Complete DLC Bundle.
